ygData.subject: Re: Memmed spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I m level 30  the spells I currently use are 1. Heal 2. Greater Healing 3. Holy Might   (I use this on NPC s that heal right as they start to cast their heal,
ygData.messageBody:
I'm level 30 the spells I currently use are
1. Heal
2. Greater Healing
3. Holy Might (I use this on NPC's that heal right as they start to cast
their heal, it usually gives my party enough time to
finish off the baddie).
4. Smite or Wrath
5. Root
6. Divine
7. Guard
8. Bravery

If i'm soloing I use
1. Healing
2. Smite
3. Wrath
4. Root
5. Divine
6. The newest version of Divine (forget the name)
7. Guard
8. Bravery


When I first got holy might (I belive it was level 24) my roots tended to
get interrupted more while soloing, I would use the stun, root, nuke
tactic from about 24-27

Of course we have more buffs available than the two slots I use for buffs,
I just cycle through the buffs but always leave guard and bravery memed
between buffs as they are the two most useful... (I use symbol buffs if
we are going to fight something more difficult)



Mr. J Daniels


On Mon, 21 Jun 1999, Allsar wrote:

> From: "Allsar" <bogey@...>
>
> I'm level 22, and here's my memmed spells: Healing (hotkeyed), Daring,
> Smite(hk), Expulse undead (hk), Spirit armor, root (this is the one i
> change), divine aura (hk), and gate. Its really important to always have
> gate memorized in case youre in a sticky situation.
> Allsar Olath`Vlos - Rathe
> -----Original Message-----
> From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, June 21, 1999 10:57 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Memmed spells
>
>
> >From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>
> >
> >As coot pointed out, you will constantly need to mem new spells
> >depending on what you are fighting. However, I always keep my best
> >hp/ac buff in (center right now seeing as i'm only lvl 17), root, divine
> >aura, and a heal spell. The others vary on what i'm fighting and
> >whether or not i'm grouped or solo.
